issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: I am seeing multiple typos "covert" (instead of convert, although covert is also a correct English word) here and there, especially in comments. But I caught a "covert" typo in a dfsadmin error message as well as its documentation.
fields.summary: Fix typos in DFSAdmin command line and documentation

comments.body: Rev01: there are three "covert" typos related to DFSAdmin. One of them is a command line error message. Is this an incompatible change? Some tools may rely on the error message.

| (x) *{color:red}-1 overall{color}* |
